page.title: 04Life Style in Johnstone
page.content: Adults and teenagers both tend to lean towards a more conventional dress in Johnstone - and don't often use clothes to express themselves.If they want to be seen in more outrageous dress they tend to travel to Glasgow. The town however does have a minority of Mod and Punk fashion. Music in Johnstone is split into three main categories - namely: "Pop Music"- popular sounds mostly found in the charts.This type of music appeals to the majority of people in Johnstone; "Mod Music"-this has its roots in Soul music of the 1960's, although it has changed slightly since then; "Punk Music"-based on simplistic guitar chords and raucous vocals. There are four hotels in this area. They all have public restaurants and licensed bars.They offer well priced meals for the local community.
